post:
This page here: http://www.wcloudhosting.com/dedicated-server-hosting

Has dedicated server for $20/mo

Specs are:

RAM : 2 GB DDR3

CPU : Intel Celeron/Atom - 1 x 1.2 GHz

Storage : 500 Go - SATA2

Bandwidth : 100 Mbps

Traffic : 5 TB

$19.99 USD Monthly




At this price I don't see how it isn't a scam, but what have I got to loose?

I just ordered one. I'll update after it gets setup if there's interest.
